name: PUT_post
descriptionHtml:
Request:

PUT : https://restful-booker.herokuapp.com/booking/417

header:

  "Content-Type":"application/json"
  "Cookie":"token=5662ce15e441007"

  "Accept-Encoding":"gzip, deflate, br"
  "Connection":"keep-alive"
  "Content-Length":"252"

body:

    "firstname" : "Dimasya",
    "lastname" : "Spirl",
    "totalprice" : 111,
    "depositpaid" : true,
    "bookingdates" : {
        "checkin" : "2022-01-01",
        "checkout" : "2023-02-01"
    },
    "additionalneeds" : "Breakfast"
}
